Official: New Verb: DUSKRUIN

7
horibu
Sunday, August 20th, 2017, 10:42:35 PM

Original URL: http://forums.play.net/forums/GemStone%20IV/GemStone%20IV%20Announcements/Important%20Announcements/view/2857

From Wyrom:

Hey everyone, I just rolled in a new verb, DUSKRUIN. This will give you your individual stats on how you've been doing in the sewers and arena starting April 2017. It will also tell you if you've earned an invite to the smithy. Enjoy!

Wyrom, PM

This message was originally posted in Paid Events: Adventures, Quests, and SimuCoins, Duskruin Arena. To discuss the above, follow the link below.

http://forums.play.net/forums/19/218/3267/view/7352
